learning-rust-by-counting-words.title: Learning Rust By Counting Words
learning-rust-by-counting-words.description: Learn the fundamentals of Rust by building a command line tool that counts the words in a text file. Sounds trivial, right? No worries, you will be challenged, no matter your level of experience. Almost playfully, you'll learn the fundamentals of Rust, and you'll be able to confidently write your own programs with Rust shortly after.
